channel.title: Beso on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Beso on Simba Tango

item.title: Día del padre/Father's Day
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Look what Simba got for Father’s Day! Guess which is now the favourite book for the night-time reading? Even beats That’s not my Dinosaur. The daddy frog and the froglet seems to be my son’s favourite part of this book, though. The book is by Anne Gutman and Georg Hallensleben, published by chronicle books.

item.title: Un beso...
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Kevin Steele Buenos Aires is not like home. And when in Rome, drive like the Romans… And the Argentines kiss when they meet. Better get used to it. (...) would lean over, ready to commit the act that, I thought, was reserved only for girlfriends and, on occasion, family. This guy used a few months it seems, but has written a really entertaining account of the argentinian kissing habits.
